com.cyc.kb.spi

Interface FactService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AssertionService

    public interface FactService
extends AssertionService
    Provides implementations of Fact.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fact findOrCreate(Sentence formula)

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Fact get(String hlid)
  throws KbTypeException,
         CreateException
        Get the Fact object that corresponds to hlid. Throws exceptions if the hlid isn't in the KB, or if it's not already an assertion and a GAF. NOTE: The get (String) factory methods in other classes find objects based on hlid or string representation of the object. They use nameOrId as the string variable name. But this method finds objects based on hlid alone. This is because it is much more common and easier to find assertions based on two strings, formula and context.
        Specified by:
        get in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        hlid - the hlid corresponding to the Fact in the KB
        Returns:
        a Fact based on hlid
        Throws:
        KbTypeException - if fact based on hlid is not an instance of assertion
        CreateException
        See Also:
        AssertionService.get(com.cyc.kb.Sentence, com.cyc.kb.Context), AssertionService.get(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • get

        Fact get(String formulaStr,
         String ctxStr)
  throws KbTypeException,
         CreateException,
         KbObjectNotFoundException
        Get the Fact object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr. Throws exceptions if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB, or if it's not already an assertion and a GAF.
        Specified by:
        get in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - string representation of the formula to be found
        ctxStr - string representation of the context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formulaStr and ctxStr
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        KbObjectNotFoundException - if no fact with the given formula string is found in the context
        See Also:
        AssertionService.get(java.lang.String)

      • get

        Fact get(Sentence formula,
         Context ctx)
  throws KbTypeException,
         CreateException,
         KbObjectNotFoundException
        Get the Fact object that corresponds to formula in the context ctx. Throws exceptions if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB, or if it's not already an assertion and a GAF.
        Specified by:
        get in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formula - formula to be found
        ctx - context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        KbObjectNotFoundException - if no fact with the given formula string is found in the context
        See Also:
        AssertionService.get(java.lang.String)

      • findOrCreate

        Fact findOrCreate(String formulaStr)
           throws CreateException,
                  KbTypeException,
                  InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Fact object that corresponds to formulaStr in the default assertion context. Tries to assert if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion or it is not a GAF. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default Direction is set to Direction.FORWARD by default
        Specified by:
        findOrCreate in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - the string representation of the formula to be found or created
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formulaStr and the default assertion context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no fact with the given formula string is found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        Fact findOrCreate(String formulaStr,
                  String ctxStr)
           throws CreateException,
                  KbTypeException,
                  InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Fact object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr. Tries to assert if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion or it is not a GAF. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default Direction is set to Direction.FORWARD by default
        Specified by:
        findOrCreate in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - the string representation of the formula to be found or created
        ctxStr - the string representation of the context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formulaStr and ctxStr
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no fact with the given formula string is found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        Fact findOrCreate(String formulaStr,
                  String ctxStr,
                  Assertion.Strength strength,
                  Assertion.Direction direction)
           throws CreateException,
                  KbTypeException,
                  InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Fact object that corresponds to formulaStr in the context corresponding to ctxStr. Tries to assert if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion or it is not a GAF.
        Specified by:
        findOrCreate in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - the string representation of the formula to be found or created
        ctxStr - the string representation of the context of the formula
        strength - the strength of the assertion
        direction - the direction of the assertion
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no fact with the given formula string is found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        Fact findOrCreate(Sentence formula)
           throws KbTypeException,
                  CreateException
        Finds or creates the Fact object that corresponds to formula in the default assertion context. Tries to assert if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion or it is not a GAF. NOTE: All findOrCreate factory methods that take CycObject do not eventually create any new object in the assertion because (most of) the CycObjects can only be built based on objects in the KB. Some exceptions are Sentences, Variables and Symbols. NAUTs are also not in the KB, but in the API they are effectively treated as being in the KB. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default Direction is set to Direction.FORWARD by default
        Specified by:
        findOrCreate in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formula - the formula to be found or created
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formula and default assertion context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no fact with the given formula string is found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        Fact findOrCreate(Sentence formula,
                  Context ctx)
           throws KbTypeException,
                  CreateException,
                  InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Fact object that corresponds to formula in ctx. Tries to assert if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion or it is not a GAF. NOTE: All findOrCreate factory methods that take CycObject do not eventually create any new object in the assertion because (most of) the CycObjects can only be built based on objects in the KB. Some exceptions are Sentences, Variables and Symbols. NAUTs are also not in the KB, but in the API they are effectively treated as being in the KB. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default Direction is set to Direction.FORWARD by default
        Specified by:
        findOrCreate in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formula - the formula to be found or created
        ctx - the context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no fact with the given formula string is found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        Fact findOrCreate(Sentence formula,
                  Context ctx,
                  Assertion.Strength strength,
                  Assertion.Direction direction)
           throws CreateException,
                  KbTypeException,
                  InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Fact object that corresponds to formula in ctx. Tries to assert if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion or it is not a GAF. NOTE: All findOrCreate factory methods that take CycObject do not eventually create any new object in the assertion because (most of) the CycObjects can only be built based on objects in the KB. Some exceptions are Sentences, Variables and Symbols. NAUTs are also not in the KB, but in the API they are effectively treated as being in the KB.
        Specified by:
        findOrCreate in interface AssertionService
        Parameters:
        formula - the formula to be found or created
        ctx - the context of the formula
        strength - the strength of the assertion
        direction - the direction of the assertion
        Returns:
        a Fact based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no Fact with the given formula string is found or created in the context
